summary: New Kids on the Block is an American boy band from Massachusetts, made up of five members. They were super popular in the late 1980s and early 1990s, selling over 80 million records. The band won two American Music Awards and even performed at the Super Bowl. They broke up in 1994 but reunited in 2007, releasing new music and touring. In 2014, they were honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
title: New Kids on the Block
